name: Titan
overview: Titan is a 1 - 2 player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player controls a small spaceship that moves in the cardinal directions within a maze. The player can fire vertically forwards, and can shoot enemy ships. They must try to collect all the pellets within a maze to advance to a more difficult challenge. The player starts with 5 ships, and it's game over when all are lost.
